Strings.String: Adjust treble and bass to your taste.
Tune your speakers to sound right for your room.
Configure Sonos to run on your wireless network.
To change the preset wireless channel, choose a different channel.
Choose a new setting to override the preset for Line-In and DOCK.
To connect this Android™ device to a system that is already set up, or to use it to set up a new system, press the Next button below.
An error occurred while trying to update your Sonos system (ID=%1$d).

There was a problem in checking for updates (ID=%1$d).
Please check your Internet connection or try again later.

An error occurred while trying to update your Sonos system:
Current device is %1$s (ID=%2$d).

Unable to complete the Sonos software update (ID=%1$d).
Please try again later.

Your Sonos product could not be added. A controller update is required.
After you have completed registration, please update this controller, then add your new products.
Press "Next" to continue with registration.

Your new Sonos product could not be added. A controller update is required.
Please update this controller, then add your new product.
Press 'Set up %1$s' to add %1$s to your Sonos system.
If you want to change the default account for this controller, tap the name for your %1$s account in the main menu.
When you have made your adjustment, press Next below.
Please install the latest version of the Sonos Controller.
Please install the latest version of the Sonos Controller.
Please press the home button to complete the reset, then reopen the Sonos Controller.

String.comment: Please leave the asterisks in localized versions as well. The text in between the asterisks should exactly match STR_AddFavorite

Strings.String: To add stations, playlists, albums or artists to Sonos Favorites, tap ⋯ while browsing or playing music and choose *Add to My Sonos*.
Failed to remove "%1$s" from My Sonos
To create a Sonos Playlist tap ⋯ above.

String.comment: Please leave the asterisks in localized versions as well. The text in between the asterisks should exactly match SCLIB_STR_AddToSonosPlaylist

Strings.String: To add a song to this playlist, tap ⋯ while browsing or playing music and choose *Add to Sonos Playlist*.

'%1$s' is no longer available. The device where the music files are stored may not be powered on, or the path may have changed. Go to Settings > Manage Music Library > Music Library Setup to check the path name.
This gives us permission to look for your nearby speakers.
Are you sure you don't want to allow location access?
We won't use location data for anything outside of helping you set up and troubleshoot your speakers.
Your location services setting is turned off. You need to have it on so we can find your speakers.
Are you sure you don't want to turn on location services?
If location services is off, you'll need an Ethernet cable to finish setup.
Now go back to the Sonos app.

String.comment: New Line is required for English only. Use previous translation for all other langauges
Non-breaking space for English only. Use previous translation for all other langauges
Non-breaking hyphen and new line for English only. Use previous translation for all other langauges
New Line for English only. Use previous translation for all other langauges

Strings.String: We found Sonos on the *%1$s* wireless network.
We found a new Sonos speaker on the *%1$s* wireless network.

"%1$s" added to My Sonos.
There are %2$d free remaining My Sonos slots.

"%1$s" added to My Sonos.
There is only 1 free remaining My Sonos slot.

"%1$s" added to My Sonos.
All available slots for My Sonos have been used.
"%1$s" is already added to My Sonos and will not be added again.

Unable to add to My Sonos. There are no empty slots remaining.
You can remove existing items from My Sonos to make room for new ones.
Unable to add "%1$s" to My Sonos.
Unable to add to My Sonos. To make additional room for new items, consider removing existing items, or remove items from My Radio Stations or My Radio Shows.
